item.title: Strong Towns Halifax
item.description: Strong Towns Halifax is a conversation of Strong Towns, it is a hyper local advocacy group.

item.title: Strong Towns
item.description: Strong Towns is a movement advocating for financially strong communities through smart urban planning. Emphasizing walkable neighborhoods, cycling infrastructure, and public transit to create sustainable and vibrant cities. Learn More
